name: Voidbreaker
description:
PREMISE
You are a mechanoid that has lost your pilot, stranded on The Void a planet that is falling to pieces you must save him before the world crumbles and everything falls into the vast emptiness of space.

CONTROLS
Click highlighted tiles to move and attack.
Press the Red Button to toggle double damage.
Press the Blue Button to toggle invincibility.
Drag the Green Button to shoot land-generating rockets.

HOW TO WIN
Generate land to escape falling tiles.
Defeat enemies to earn more land rockets.
Hunt and defeat bosses to reach the end.

CREDITS
Programming by Bouncing Turtle
Music by Neverdusk
Made using the Lancer Tiles Pack by Jao
